title: Single-use fonts
content:
Is there a font you've bought for use one a project, intending to use it again, for which you've never found a second suitable application?  
—Joel
author: JCSalomon

comments.content:
Well, there are many... Many I've bought and NEVER found a use for, too — but [Monday Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414201910/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/item.php/type/sans/Monday/) by [Hubert Jocham](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414201910/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/page.php/me/) comes to mind. Especially due to its ‘wide stance’ and odd lowercase g’s… A nice typeface, though… ;)

Bought that one for a magazine spread. I believe it had something to do with the environment…
